From Hays, we are collaborating with a leading telecommunications company in Europe and the US in the opening of their new technological Hub in Valencia.  They are expanding the team looking for experiencedSenior Data Architect to join an international team.Data Architecture Strategy: - Formulate and propel the comprehensive data architecture strategy in harmony with the organization¬¥s business goals.  - Work with stakeholders to comprehend data needs and convert them into extensive and scalable data solutions. Data Architecture Planning:  - Create and uphold a detailed data architecture roadmap, taking into account both immediate objectives and long-term aspirations.  - Assess and suggest technologies and tools that correspond with the organization¬¥s progressing data requirements. Data Modeling and Design: - Supervise the design and execution of sturdy data models that cater to the organization¬¥s present and future needs.  - Design and execute sturdy data models that accommodate both transactional and analytical needs.  - Guarantee data integrity, uniformity, and precision across diverse databases and data sources.  - Ensure data models comply with industry best practices and standards. Data Integration: - Supervise the amalgamation of data from diverse sources, ensuring smooth and precise data flow.  - Implement data integration solutions that cater to real-time and batch processing needs.  - Formulate and enforce data management policies and procedures to ensure data quality, uniformity, and security. Teamwork and Communication: - Work in unison with multidisciplinary teams, including data scientists, analysts, and software engineers, to guarantee a unified and integrated approach to data management.  - Offer technical guidance and mentorship to the less experienced members of the data architecture team.  - Explain intricate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders in an easy-to-understand manner. Data Governance and Protection: - Formulate and enforce data governance policies and procedures to ensure data quality and adherence to regulations.  - Put in place strong security measures to safeguard sensitive data assets. Ongoing Enhancement: - Keep up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies pertinent to data architecture.  - Spot opportunities for ongoing enhancement and optimization of data-related processes. Requirements: - Possession of a Bachelor¬¥s or Master¬¥s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or a related discipline.  - Demonstrated experience in a Data Architect role or similar, with at least 4 years of pertinent experience.  - Possession of a Google Cloud Professional Data Engineer certification or related GCP certifications is highly advantageous.  - Proficiency in the design and implementation of data solutions on the Google Cloud Platform.  - Solid expertise in GCP data services, including BigQuery, Cloud Storage, Dataflow, and Pub/Sub.  - Experience with GCP-specific data modeling tools, such as BigQuery ML and Data Catalog.  - English Level B2+ What can you expect from us: - A global, upbeat, dynamic, amicable, and inspiring work atmosphere.  - A blended or remote work approach.  - Adjustable work hours.  - Outstanding opportunities for career and personal growth.  - Adaptable Remuneration Scheme.  - Life and accident coverage.

herramientas: Genesys, SIP, Genesys Engage, Genesys Cloud
descripcion: We are looking for a passionate and talented Genesys Technical Consultant to join our client and support the implementation of Genesys Solutions for their B2B clients (Engage and Cloud).The ideal candidate will have experience in developing or build Genesys solutions and will have a deep understanding of the platform and its capabilities.Responsibilities:* Deploying and configuring Genesys Engage and Genesys Cloud solutions.* Integrating Genesys solutions seamlessly with third-party applications, either through standard or custom methods.* Managing the end-to-end implementation process, encompassing solution design, technical specifications, system configuration, testing, rollout, and post-rollout support.* Tailoring solutions to meet client-specific requirements by leveraging features provided by Genesys Engage and Genesys Cloud.* Offering expertise and best practices to address technical questions and topics related to Genesys solutions.* Providing support for pre-sales activities.* Conducting requirement elicitation and analysis.* Estimating efforts for change requests and new solution implementations.Want to know more about client?Our client is part of a Company of Switzerland‚Äôs leading IT & Telecom company that serves many industries. Government, Military, Insurance, Banking, SME and Residential customers ‚Äì they do it all. They are actively driving Cloud native digitalization and networking and tapping new paths for their customers and their employees. They do not know what the future is going to look like but They are at the leading edge of new technologies and have the opportunity to shape it. To do so they are and act trustworthy, committed, and curious. They are currently recruiting IT passionate professionals who are keen on developing high-quality software, have an agile mindset and appreciate collaboration with motivated colleagues from all over the world.What¬¥s in it for you?Work environment* Agile way of working, multi-cultural and international work environment promoting work-life balance* Autonomy, flexibility, opportunity and growth* Cool office space in the centre of MadridAllowances* Telephone/internet and home office allowance* Paid training days and access to Swisscom learning platforms, language courses.* Company health insurance, Gym subscriptionLeaves policy* Care, bereavement, maternity and paternity leaves* 25 days paid vacation days plus Spanish national holidays.Requirements and Skills:‚Ä¢ Bachelor¬¥s degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.‚Ä¢ Excellent proficiency in English, coupled with strong communication and interpersonal skills.‚Ä¢ Proficiency in networking and SIP-based solutions.‚Ä¢ Expertise in web services and API integrations.‚Ä¢ Over two years of hands-on experience in Genesys configuration, engineering, and customization.‚Ä¢ Proficient understanding of Genesys Solutions, including Engage and Cloud, along with a comprehensive knowledge of their capabilities.‚Ä¢ A minimum of one Genesys certification, either in Engage or Cloud, is mandatory.‚Ä¢ Demonstrated problem-solving skills with a keen focus on delivering high-quality solutions.‚Ä¢ Independent and reliable work approach, capable of thriving in a fast-paced and dynamic environment.‚Ä¢ Flexible, self-motivated, and committed personality, capable of maintaining a clear overview even in complex situations.‚Ä¢ Highest standards of personal and professional integrity with a strong work ethic.‚Ä¢ Delivery-oriented, with a willingness to commit and drive operations to successful completion.

At HAYS we are collaborating with a multinational group that operates in more than 45 countries through its subsidiaries. They have more than 135 sales branches and more than 35 production centers around the world, in addition to strategically distributed logistics platforms to support both production and distribution centers. This global platform allows the company to distribute a wide variety of products and devices, adapting to the peculiarities of each region, pool and client. We are seeking for an IT Infrastructure Project Manager with the mission to lead datacenters relocation and to migrate these to the private cloud technology VMware Cloud Foundation with the Veeam backup solution. What are the responsibilities?  - The Project Manager is responsible for piloting the organization through the design, planning, build, implementation and transition-to-Operations phases  - Adopting best project management methodologies, preferibly PMP.   - The candidate reports to the Global IT Technology Director. Which are the requirements?  - At least 5 years of experience at managing datacenters related IT Infrastructure projects managing multiple vendors like infrastructure implementation partners as well as with the internal IT Infrastructure and Cybersecurity teams  - Being comfortable and swift in preparing presentations, status reports, steerco reports and in communication with the stakeholders  - Proficiency in using project management tools like MS Project, SmartSheet, PowerPoint and MS O365/Teams  - Some of the key technologies involved: Fortiswitch, Fortigate, FortiEMS, SD-WAN, VMware/Vsphere/Vcenter, VMware Cloud Foundation, Veeam, VxRail, Active Directory  - To Work across Europe and the United States time zones with ocassional traveling  - Fluent in written and verbal English and Spanish is mandatory  What we offer?  - Location: Sant Cugat (next to FCG station Sant Joan).  - Competitive salary  - Opportunity to participate on an international huge project   - Work modality: hybrid (2 days teleworking)   We are waiting for profiles like yours, who are passionate about technology and want to face a new challenge. If this is your case, sign up for the offer so we can tell you more!

The IT Security Officer is responsible for implementing and supporting security technology solutions. titulo: Paid Media Executive CE and MEA
descripcion: Perfil buscado (Hombre/Mujer)   With paid media being an important channel within our digital marketing mix, you will be tasked with shaping and executing the paid media strategy for our +10 EMEA markets. Within the CE & MEA, Digital team, you will be the subject matter expert and go-to person for all things paid media.  In our Barcelona shared service center, you will be supported by and collaborate with a team of digital marketing professionals, working together with a wider marketing community covering +10 CE & MEA, countries, as well as the global media team and our global media agency.  Supported by our global media agency and broader marketing team, your responsibilities will be as follows: ‚Ä¢ Oversee the planning, execution, optimization, and reporting of all paid media campaigns on search, social and display channels. ‚Ä¢ Develop a comprehensive paid social strategy at regional level, aligning it with local country priorities. ‚Ä¢ Collaborate with paid media team members in different regions to create global projects and facilitate knowledge sharing. ‚Ä¢ Act as the primary point of contact for all paid media activities, externally for our global media agency and internally within the marketing teams. ‚Ä¢ Cultivate and manage relationships with our paid media agency and other media partners. ‚Ä¢ Ensure the seamless execution of the overall strategy, exploring optimization opportunities, and delivering regular reports to various internal teams. ‚Ä¢ Provide thorough and insightful reporting on each campaign, extract key learnings, and apply them to future campaigns.  ‚Ä¢ Paid Media Executive CE and MEA|PageGroup SSC  The successful candidate is a digitally literate, pro-active, collaborative marketer with passion for technology and new media, ready to advance their career in an innovative and international environment.   The desired profile includes: ‚Ä¢ 3+ years of paid media experience. Extensive prior experience with LinkedIn and Google Ads is a must. ‚Ä¢ Ability to develop and execute comprehensive paid media strategies aligned with business goals. ‚Ä¢ Experience in managing paid media budgets exceeding 50k per month is valued. ‚Ä¢ Strong project management abilities, capable of leading initiatives with multiple stakeholders. ‚Ä¢ Proficient in analytics and data-driven decision-making, with the ability to derive insights from campaign reports. ‚Ä¢ Advanced knowledge of analytical tools such as Google Analytics and Power BI.  ‚Ä¢ Able to work with numbers, with a proficient grasp of Excel. ‚Ä¢ Excellent oral and written command of the English language. Any other European language is considered a plus.    PageGroup SSC Barcelona  ‚Ä¢ Competitive salary ‚Ä¢ Side benefits ‚Ä¢ 2 days from home ‚Ä¢ Career path

From Hays, we are collaborating with a leading telecommunications company in Europe and the US in the opening of their new technological Hub in Valencia.  They are expanding the team looking for experiencedSolution Architect to join an international team.What will be your responsibilities? - Collaborate in the planning and development of the Architectural Runway for a comprehensive E2E Solution with the Solution and Domain/System Architects.  - Actively assist in the design and guidance of the Continuous Delivery Model & Architecture.  - Establish and aid in defining Non-functional Requirements and the Architecture Enablers to facilitate the Business Objectives in terms of T2M, Scalability, and Business & Software Stability for Fibre Rollout.  - Work alongside System Architects to develop Business & System Capabilities and Features of the entire Cloud Multi-Tenant Architecture.  - Promote Built-in Quality throughout the entire Solution.  - Participate in the Definition, Design, Implementation, Rollout, and Governance of the Architecture Vision.  - Ensure alignment with the Business and Technical Vision and the Domain Transformation Journey (e.g., Decoupling/Cloudification/Automation). Create architectural concepts/structures, including the development of technical concepts considering holistic business requirements and implications.  - Lead, communicate, and actively drive the implementation of the Architecture Vision in alignment with various Stakeholders in the Program (Business Owners, SD; PM/PO, the Scrum Teams, STE/RTE, End Users).  - Identify the Solution Space of Business and/or Technical solution options for clearly defined business challenges and scope.  - Define and communicate the Architecture Roadmap of the entire Solution of the projects.  - Provide the development teams with a clear description of the Architecture Requirements and communicate Best Practices on how to proceed.  - Participate in the transfer of know-how within the program and collaborate with other Communities, SDOs, Open Source, etc., to drive the Lead Digital Telco Vision of the company. You will excel if you possess: - Knowledge of Cloud Architecture (Container Orchestration K8S, Docker, Monitoring & logging, Serverless, AWS); Open APIs; TMF Frameworx (e.g., ODA, TMF Open API); CI/CD, Software Architecture & Design.  - Strong expertise in Micro Service Rest Architecture, DevOps Practices; AIOps.  - Outstanding communication skills.  - Analytical abilities, problem-solving skills, and critical thinking.  - Experience in the Telecoms Field & Fibre Access Technology.  - Familiarity with the SAFE Agile Framework.  - Proficiency in English at the B2 level or above. If you are interested in learning more about the project, do not hesitate to apply, and we will contact you as soon as possible.
